// Search Options:-- // Keyword search // posted date search (date search) // response date search (date search) // place of performance state search option (multiple checkboxes) // place of performance zipcode search (comma saparated zipcode) // Naics code search (multiple checkbox - this is also separted search) // PSC code search (multiple checkbox - this is also separted search) // Federal set-aside code search (multiple checkbox - this is also separted search) // Agency and Subagency Search (multiple search - this is also separted search) import React, { useState } from 'react'; import DatePicker from 'react-datepicker' import "react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css" const SolicitationSearchBar = () => { const [searchform, setSearchform] = useState({ keyword: '', postedfromDate: '', postedtoDate: '', statepref: [], zipcode: '', responsefromDate: '', responsetoDate: '' }) const inputVal = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setSearchform({ ...searchform, [name]: value }) } const checkVal = (e) => { const statepref = searchform.statepref; let index; if(e.target.checked){ statepref.push(e.target.value) }else{ index = statepref.indexOf(e.target.value) statepref.splice(index, 1) } setSearchform({ ...searchform, statepref: statepref }) } console.log(searchform); return (
I am looking for...
Posted Date (Single or Range)
{ setSearchform({ ...searchform, postedfromDate: date }) }} />
{ setSearchform({ ...searchform, postedtoDate: date }) }} />
